modName: Immersive Load Screen Messages - Dawnguard and Dragonborn
summary: Load Screen dialogue replacement, ultimately giving a more immersive feel to Skyrim and Solstheim.
descriptionHtml:
[center]  [img]http://i.imgur.com/kYiIJsk.png[/img][size=6]
[/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6uptclR.png[/img]
[color=#ff0000][size=4]
[/size][/color][size=4]Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8374179] GiveitaTaunderbolt[/url] the development of this mod can continue. Please visit their page and keep an eye out for this mod. I really am appreciative of them taking this mod forward, thank you.[/size]
[font=Courier New][color=#ff7700][/color][/font]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/o9p1O3D.png[/img]
[size=4]
[font=Trebuchet MS]Immersive Load Screens Messages is a small project, ultimately recreating the vanilla and DLC load screens to give off a more immersive feel.
The idea was originally thought of when the vanilla load screens began to become constant and boring; overlooked, if you will.[/font][/size]

[color=#ff7700][size=6][u][img]http://i.imgur.com/wX1wwSu.png[/img]
[/u][/size][/color][size=4][font=Trebuchet MS]The DLC load screen dialogues have been completed, fixed and sorted. With that being around 60 in total, I only have the Skyrim load screens to replace. No new load screens have been added yet, and the MCM has not taken action.[/font]

[/size][color=#ff7700][size=6][u][font=Arial][img]http://i.imgur.com/CCqX6kH.png[/img][/font]

[/u][/size][/color][size=4][font=Trebuchet MS]• Change essential corner messages to display in a message box;
• Possible translations, as I only speak English;
• Have an MCM configuration to enable and disable load screen messages (this may take a while, I have no Papyrus experience);
• Anything else that gets recommended.[/font]


[/size][color=#ff7700][size=6][font=Arial]    [u][img]http://i.imgur.com/E9QGdvi.png[/img][/u][/font]
[/size][/color][color=#ffff00]
[size=3]** Nexus Mod Manager / Mod Organiser recommended **[/size][/color]
[size=3]
[font=Trebuchet MS]To install[/font][/size][font=Trebuchet MS]

[size=4]1. Locate your TESV.exe directory,
2. Open your Data folder,
3. Place {file/s name/s}.esp  in your Data folder - make sure you do [color=#ff0000]NOT [/color]place it in the TESV.exe directory.

[/size][size=3]To uninstall

[/size][size=4]1. Locate your TESV.exe directory,[/size]
[size=4]2. Open your Data folder,[/size]
[size=4]3. Delete ILSMS.esp and/or ILSMDawnguard.esp[/size]

[size=4]As this mod only uses a .esp, you wont go through any hassle with uninstalling this mod.[/size][/font]

[size=6][font=Arial][color=#efefef]   [/color][u][img]http://i.imgur.com/kRd9vBM.png[/img][/u][/font]
[/size][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4]
 Skyrim[/size]
[size=4]    Dragonborn DLC
    Dawnguard DLC[/size][/font]

[font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=6][u][img]http://i.imgur.com/b0WZc0Z.png[/img][/u][/size][/color][/font]

[size=4][font=Trebuchet MS]Bethesda - Skyrim and Creation Kit
[/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/28843625/?]

[/url][font=Comic Sans MS][img]http://i.imgur.com/8WzmqcY.png[/img][/font]

[font=Trebuchet MS]The following dialogue changes may seem to be from experience, but in fact have the same affect on everybody:

Dragonborn--

DLC2Solstheim3: Flora growth
DLC2Solstheim4: The Northern Maidern transport

Unchanged dialogue;

DLC2MQLore1: Dragonborn Lore
DLC2Solstheim5: Quote

Dawnguard--

Currently fixing[/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][img]http://i.imgur.com/6uptclR.png[/img][/font]


[/size][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffff00][size=5][img]http://i.imgur.com/8m0n6kL.png[/img]
[/size][/color][/font][/center][font=Times New Roman][center][/center][/font]
author: TentorIV

files.name: ILSMDragonborn 1.2
files.changelogHtml: Dragonborn files grammatically corrected. MCM menu MAY take action shortly.

files.changelogHtml: Dragonborn files grammatically corrected. MCM menu MAY take action shortly.
